Task Title: Try ASC multi video ad on existing best performing campaign with 3 video - 1) Raw video 2) Video with current trending song 3) video with price on it
Predicted Intent:
Intent 
- To get products picked in marketing when there is low traction on Banner & Conversion ads. 
- Increase brand awareness, engagement, and conversions through video ads.
 
Benefit 
- Better marketing on single product - Ease in managing stock - Increase in order volume. Increase CTR and brand recall for higher conversions.

Tradeoff
- Effort in making good quality video
-  Potentially higher CPM
